mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM ATTENDANCE
SELECT COUNT(*)/4 as cnt FROM salary

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT s.salary_inday, s.sal_num, s.id, s.salary_month, m.name, d.depart_name FROM salary s ,manager m ,depart d WHERE s.id = m.id AND m.depart = d.depart order by salary_inday ) PIVOT ( SUM(salary_month) FOR sal_num IN (1 AS sal, 2 AS over, 3 AS meals, 4 AS car) ) WHERE ROWNUM >= #{start} AND ROWNUM <= #{end}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT s.salary_inday, s.sal_num, s.id, s.salary_month, m.name, d.depart_name FROM salary s ,manager m ,depart d WHERE s.id = m.id AND m.depart = d.depart AND m.name =#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) PIVOT ( SUM(salary_month) FOR sal_num IN (1 AS sal, 2 AS over, 3 AS meals, 4 AS car) )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT s.salary_inday, s.sal_num, s.id, s.salary_month, m.name, d.depart_name FROM salary s ,manager m ,depart d WHERE s.id = m.id AND m.depart = d.depart ) PIVOT ( SUM(salary_month) FOR sal_num IN (1 AS sal, 2 AS over, 3 AS meals, 4 AS car) )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT s.salary_inday, s.sal_num, s.id, s.salary_month, m.name, d.depart_name FROM salary s ,manager m ,depart d WHERE s.id = m.id AND m.depart = d.depart AND TO_CHAR(s.salary_inday,'YYYY-MM') >=#{sm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND TO_CHAR(s.salary_inday,'YYYY-MM') <=#{em,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) PIVOT ( SUM(salary_month) FOR sal_num IN (1 AS sal, 2 AS over, 3 AS meals, 4 AS car) )
